# bq-option-group



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Overview

The option group component is a container for multiple option elements.
It allows to manage the appearance and size of all options at once.

## Slots

| Slot              | Description                   |
| ----------------- | ----------------------------- |
|                   | The option items              |
| `"header-label"`  | The label of the option group |
| `"header-prefix"` | The prefix of the label       |
| `"header-suffix"` | The suffix of the label       |


## Shadow Parts

| Part       | Description                                                      |
| ---------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------- |
| `"group"`  | The `div` element which holds the option items                   |
| `"label"`  | The `legend` tag element which acts as a container for the label |
| `"prefix"` | The prefix of the label                                          |
| `"suffix"` | The suffix of the label                                          |


----------------------------------------------

*Built with [StencilJS](https://stenciljs.com/)*
